section.p: "Indicates the category of caregiver with responsibility for managing this specific problem (e.g., care team, nursing, medicine, respiratory therapy, occupational therapy, dietary, etc.)." - HL7 Version 2.8, PRB-11

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] code with data type Code
"Indicates the category of caregiver with responsibility for managing this specific problem (e.g., care team, nursing, medicine, respiratory therapy, occupational therapy, dietary, etc.)." - HL7 Version 2.8, PRB-11. Note that HL7does not provide any suggested values for this code.

Contains exactly one [1..1] code with data type Code
